name: Crime City (itch) (CrypticR3D)
description:
As this is an Action Beat 'em up style game, here are some of the key features of the gameplay experience.

➔Authentic retro styling, emulating games found on the PS1
➔Shooting - TBC
➔Melee combat - TBC
➔Light exploration / Traversing the city
➔Defeat bosses and common enemies - TBC

This is a collaborative project by:  

Gameplay - Eoin Matthews

Art - Erik Wiking

Art - Charlie Allen

Art - Lorenzo Phillips

Audio - David Ling

UI - Matthew Muhle
